comment.body: damn i want zerocash to be reality  faster  #RIPbtc

@ulrichard: if is pre-mined or owned by a corporation is irrelevant to price discovery, on paper zcash it has a build in protection of metadata analysis , while btc does not have that and all payments are public, btc need to die off so we have more variety and more specific crypto, having so much value in one place is dangerous

> Why does Apple consistently make iTunes worse? 

look like you are at 3 standard deviation or more from the mean of usability  :P
you can do better man, i bet you can, the only important point is that bitcoin make restitution impossible

@Planteater: one of the pillars of property is restitution, if someone take your car you can get it back, bitcoin does not allow such a thing so bitcoin, and any crypto so far give, a suboptimal solution from a property point of view

@Planteater: there is more, things are not so simple, that is based on that the current claim on property is the only claim that can be made and be 100% correct and accurate, so nobody in the future with a better claim can get the property

@Planteater: also note bitcoin is fungible so if a person take 1$ from your he needs to give you back 1$ not exactly the same 1$ bill, a watch is not fungible and on top of that a bitcoin thief can ignore any compensations that a judge impose on him  so he is not "obligated" in any way to pay you
